comments:

This is probably related to bug 31369.  If I rename ant.bat to foo.bat, I do not
get the stacktrace.

We had a bad choice of constants for Ant process types: "ant". Changed 
to "org.eclipse.ui.externaltools.ant".

Fixed in IExternalToolsConstants, and the plugin.xml for external tools.

Please verify (DarinW).
Woops - this broke the line trackers for javac error output
